## NFTCollection.mintTo() method

Mint an NFT to the specified wallet

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
mintTo(to: string, metadata: NFTMetadataInput): Promise<string>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  to | string | the address to mint the NFT to |
|  metadata | [NFTMetadataInput](./solana.nftmetadatainput.md) | the metadata of the NFT to mint |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;string&gt;

the mint address of the minted NFT

## Example


```jsx
const to = "..."
const metadata = {
  name: "NFT #1",
  image: readFileSync("files/image.jpg"),
}
const address = await program.mintTo(to, metadata);
```
